game.name: Urban Jungle
game.shortDescription: Urban Jungle에서 아름다운 식물을 이용해 평범한 집을 녹색 안식처로 바꿔 보세요. 작은 아파트에서 각 식물에 딱 맞는 장소를 찾아 걱정 없이 정원 가꾸기를 즐겨 보세요. 그리고 고양이를 쓰다듬는 것도 잊지 마세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Use luscious plants to turn your ordinary home into a green haven in Urban Jungle. Find the best place for each plant in your small apartment and enjoy gardening without worries. And don't forget to pet your cat!

reviewHighlights.text: Good idea, but not super well made So the game is mentioned a lot as "unpacking but with plants" and for those who don't want to read my entire review...
Cute story, cute art, nice music. VERY short game that you can 100% in less than four hours but.. It has such a janky item placement, the collision is...
